medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started approximately two weeks ago and worsened in the last 24 hours, intensifying last night and this morning. Patient assumed it was a stomach bug and took laxatives. She has been experiencing bowel movements and flatus. Denies shortness of breath, chest pain, diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, fever, or chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension (HTN), Chronic kidney disease, Stage III (moderate)
medical_history.family_history: Denies family history of bleeding disorders.
